original_title: Dale Watson And His Lone Stars: For Fans Only Live
overview: On The first day of his European tour in the autumn of 2001, Dale Watson was invited to indulge the warm and intimate atmosphere of the New Road studios in Wychen, The Netherlands, to actually record the very first video for CRS' new DVD label called DaViD (throwing great music at the big world!).  In front of a select group of enchanted fans he added a new chapter to his impressive discography, playing a set that was totally different from the ones that graced his latest live album Preachin' To The Choir.
title: Dale Watson And His Lone Stars: For Fans Only Live
